summary: AI automation brand website with futuristic robotic eagle logo and premium animations
architectural_notes: Futuristic AI automation brand identity with neon cyan + dark theme
Robotic eagle logo as primary brand element with cybernetic design language
Premium cinematic animations for tech startup positioning
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- High-detail futuristic robotic eagle head with metallic structure, AI machine-style face panels, mechanical feather segments, sharp aggressive beak, glowing neon cyan energy lines, subtle circuit patterns, futuristic armor plating, symmetrical professional design, premium startup branding quality, dark background (robotic-eagle-logo.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a high-detail futuristic robotic eagle head image with metallic robotic structure, AI machine-style face panels, mechanical feather segments, sharp aggressive beak design, glowing neon cyan energy lines, subtle circuit patterns or tech engravings, futuristic armor plating look, symmetrical professional design, and premium startup branding quality that conveys AI + Automation + Power + Intelligence

Replace the current eagle logo image in EagleLogo.tsx component with the newly generated futuristic robotic eagle head, ensuring it integrates with existing neon glow effects and hover animations while maintaining strong visibility on dark background

Add a cinematic robotic activation animation sequence (2-4 seconds) to the eagle logo with the following stages: eagle head appears from dark background, neon lines activate gradually, eyes glow ON like AI boot sequence, soft energy scan passes across logo, and final subtle glow pulse after reveal, using smooth cinematic easing without sudden pop-in for a professional tech-brand feel
Implement hover interaction animation on the eagle logo that increases glow intensity slightly and adds a very small floating motion while maintaining clean professional appearance

Optimize eagle logo animations for mobile devices by automatically reducing animation weight while maintaining logo sharpness, ensuring smooth performance on phone screens and keeping the logo centered across all device sizes

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace eagle logo with high-detail futuristic robotic eagle head featuring metallic structure, glowing cyan energy lines, and circuit patterns
Add cinematic robotic activation animation (2-4s) with neon lines activating, eyes glowing on, energy scan, and subtle pulse
Add hover interaction with glow intensity increase and subtle floating motion
Optimize logo animations for mobile with reduced animation weight while maintaining sharpness

projectName: Replace eagle logo with high-detail futuristic robotic eagle head and premium animations
